name: Pirate
ability: You start knowing how many Pirates are in-play. If Pirates are the only good characters alive, good wins. [+0 to +2 Pirates]
firstNightReminder: Show each Pirate the number of in-play Pirates.

name: Witch Hunter
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. If they are not executed tomorrow, they turn evil. You can not be evil.

name: Insomniac
ability: Each night*, learn a character that died tonight.

jinxes.reason: If the Shacklewight is in-play, the Insomniac learns a character who died by the Shacklewight today.

name: Mystic
ability: If you died at night, you are reborn as a good character of your choice on the final night, even if drunk or poisoned.
otherNightReminder: If tonight is the final night and the Mystic is dead, inform the Mystic of the character they have become at dawn. They do not act as the new character tonight.

name: Queen
ability: If both of your neighbours are good, they learn who you are. Anyone mad about a Queen being in-play might be executed.
firstNightReminder: If both of the Queen's neighbours are good wake them and show them the 'This character selected you' card and then the Queen token

name: Prisoner
ability: You may not vote. You know 1 not-in-play character. If most players vote to free you, become that character & alignment.
firstNightReminder: Show the Prisoner a not-in-play character.

name: Amaniti
ability: Your neighbors register falsely to good players' abilities.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Amaniti's neighbours with Registers Falsely

jinxes.reason: The Amaniti's neighbours do not register falsely to the Ogre.
If the Plague Doctor dies, a living Minion gains the Amaniti ability in addition to their own ability, and learns this.

name: Scarecrow
ability: To good players, you register as the Demon & the Demon registers as a Minion.
firstNightReminder: Mark the Scarecrow with Registers as Demon, and the Demon with Registers as Minion.

jinxes.reason: If the Scarecrow receives the Barber choice, dead Demons register truthfully to the Barber ability.
The Hatter ability is unaffected by the Scarecrow's registration.

name: Palabra de Dios
ability: Each dusk*, for each good player with a hand raised, choose a player: they die. If no-one living raised a hand, evil wins.

name: Shacklewight
ability: Each night, choose any players: they all wake together. Tomorrow day, if 1 dies, they all die. 1 player must die each day.

name: Queen of Lies
ability: Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each chooses a different alive player, 2 of whom die.
